Scientific Technological Background 1 . General Clinical characteristic FM common rheumatologic disorder ( range 2 % -12 % general population ) complex symptom presentation include : chronically painful , soft tissue pain . Those affected suffer widespread pain tenderness anatomically define tender point soft tissue musculoskeletal structure . Associated symptom include depression , anxiety , fatigue , sleep disturbance , somatic complaint ( headache , irritable bowel bladder , morning stiffness , dysesthesia ) severe cognitive impairment .
